'''''Mythlore'' 54''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol14/iss4/ Volume 14, Issue 4]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].

==Contents==

====Articles====

* Blasdell, Heather L. " ‘…And There Shall The Lilith Repose.’"
* Wytenbroek, J. R. “Apocalyptic Vision in ''The Lord of the Rings''.”
* Patterson, Nancy-Lou. “‘All Nerves and Nose’: Lord Peter Wimsey as Wounded Healer in the Novels of Dorothy L. Sayers.”
* Edmunds, E. L. “Echoes in Age From the World of J.R.R. Tolkien.”
* Foster, Michael A. “Peter Pan: The Lost Last Act.”
* Fike, Matthew A. “The Hero's Education in Sacrificial Love: Thomas Covenant, Christ Figure.”
* Martin, Darrell A. “J.R.R. Tolkien's Calendars, or The Saga of Hador The Incompetent.”
* Pietrusz, Jim. “Rites of Passage: ''The Chronicles of Narnia'' & the Seven Sacraments.”

====Poetry====

*James, Nancy Ester. “The Choosing.”

====Features====

* GoodKnight, Glen. Onward and Upward.
* Christopher, Joe R. An Inklings' Bibliography (32).
* Hyde, Paul Nolan. “Quenti Lambardillion: The Laborer-Asthete: Tengwar on the Title Page.”
* Kondratiev, Alexei. “Tales Newly Told.”
* Letters.

====Reviews====

* ''A Cry Like a Bell.'' Madeleine L'Engle. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''C.S. Lewis: The Man and His God.'' Richard Harries. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''C.S. Lewis, Mere Christian.'' Kathryn Lindskoog. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''The Screwtape Letters.'' C.S. Lewis. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
